Changeset.Change: Support for Complete Indexes. Changes in general types, and Lucene processing, when handling the full payload for an entry.
Refactored for the new notifications library.
Changes in the lucene wrapper, for the update case, for closing deleted files that were remaining open.
Changes for supporting the CQL interface in all the types of Indices.
"Multiple collections per resource"-design adopted.
Added functionality for PROJECT DISTINCT in FWD Index.
Added functionality for projection with wildcard (PROJECT *)
Fixed a synchronization issue when a mergeAddition was invoked before a lookup resource was initialized.
Relations are now compatible with CQL Context 1.2
Added functionality for snippet support in fulltext indexing.
Bug fixing for the case a snippet projection was explicitly declared in a query.
The values used for the inclusionType modifier of geosearch relation where changed from "1","2","3" to "intersects", "contains", "inside".
Turned to Maven
Fixed a bug that caused maximumSnippetSize not to be configured from deploy-jndi-config.xml in SearchSystemService
Added logs in LuceneGcqlProcessor and HighlighterWrapper
Added ranges for Resource Registry components in pom.xml
Changed resultsetlibrary and resultsetclientlibrary to provided in pom.xml
Changed visibility of QuerySnippetTermsPair so it can be used by other components
Made BDBGcqlQueryContainer.SingleTerm class public so it can be used from couchbase-gcube
Lucene gCQL processor in now extented to work without RR and not translating IDs to fields
Lucene gCQL processor has changed to translate allIndexes to a single term query instead of ORs of all the searchables
Changed FullTextIndexType and ForwardIndexType to accept String instead of GCUBEScope
Changed IndexException to extend Throwable instead of GCUBEFault
Changed RRAdaptor to accept no arguments in the constructor
Removed FW related classes/packages
Generic Resources are retrieved by resource-manager
Removed xerces dependencies
index type bug fix
